toBuild.name: Build updater
toBuild.cmd: cd {{workdir}}/updater && {{go}} clean -modcache && {{go}} mod download && {{go}} build -o updater.a -buildmode=c-archive main.go

toBuild.name: Build resources module
toBuild.cmd: cd {{workdir}}/updater && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make

toBuild.name: Build checker
toBuild.cmd: cd {{workdir}}/checker && {{go}} clean -modcache && {{go}} mod download && {{go}} build -o checker.a -buildmode=c-archive main.go

toBuild.name: Build proxy_process module
toBuild.cmd: cd {{workdir}}/checker && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make
